short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple note-taking Chrome extension, that allows you to keep & save notes fast & easy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this Chrome extension you will be able to keep notes fast & easy. Also you can delete past notes or mark them as done. Keep your daily schedule simple and don't lose any note from now on!
